context.context: Designed for rapid token calculation without extra text, optimized for efficient token analysis.
Created to list all active modifiers for easy reference and management.
Ensures the schema remains synchronized with the latest changes, preventing outdated information.
Allows exporting the schema and glossary for external use or backup.
Dedicated schema export for focused version control.
Exports the context details for modifiers as a JSON file.
Allows for glossary export independently of the schema.
Maintains a text log of all schema and modifier updates.
Supports complex prompt analysis and creative idea generation through combinatory creation.
Designed for nested context synergy, enabling complex context layering.
Optimized for iterative improvement through feedback loops.
Generates optimized outputs using a matrix of modifiers for advanced control.
Provides flexibility by randomly applying one of the defined algorithms.
